column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Simply amazing! A place I will always suggest to anyone looking for a romantic
column3: elegant dinner. We tried the elotes style corn
column4: the goat cheese and peppered duck
column5: the shortrib stroganoff and the 16oz ribeye steak. Everything was so enjoyable even the water! The ribeye
column7: was "the best in town" and I don't think I could even begin to disagree. The staff was so nice and very attentive to anything we needed. A place I can't wait to go back too.
